[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#000000″ background_image=”https://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/2665288.png” bottom_divider_style=”wave2″ bottom_divider_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_post_title meta=”off” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” title_font=”|700|||||||” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font_size=”35px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_post_title][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”http://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/small-inner.png” background_size=”contain” custom_padding=”1px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Data-storage.jpg” alt=”Data Storage Solutions in South India, INDIA” title_text=”Data-storage solutions” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#363636” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#363636” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.2em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Data Storage Solutions in South India, INDIA

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”12px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

SECURE YOUR DATA WITH OUR BEST DATA STORAGE SOLUTIONS IN South India

FixLab provides a complete solution for data storage in South India, INDIA. Data storage is crucial for any business sector. Losing a single e-mail may disrupt the whole work of your office. So to be prepared with the best Data Storage Solutions in South India is a factor to be emphasized.

At FixLab , our team provides successful cloud backup in South India, prioritizing data integrity and security. We guarantee cost-effective and reliable data storage solutions in South India, INDIA.

The Critical Need for Data Storage and Backup Solutions in Modern Business Operations

To meet the increasing demand for data storage all over irrespective of large, medium, and small businesses including for home use, we often upgrade our data storage solutions and Cloud backup in South India. Security and integrity are the most important parts of any best IT company in South India.

CONTACT US TODAY FOR A FREE CONSULTATION AND QUOTE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIzMDEyMSJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Contact Now” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” custom_padding=”0px|35px|0px|35px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”rgba(0,168,190,0.09)” background_image=”http://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/h3-bg-section-02.jpg” background_blend=”multiply” custom_padding=”3px||7px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||23px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”16px” header_2_font=”|600|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#363636” header_2_font_size=”40px” text_orientation=”center” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”25px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.2em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

What We Offer ?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”12px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

We specialize in setting up high-performance data storage solutions for businesses in South India, INDIA. To ensure secure data storage and seamless migration, there are three basic types of backup: full, incremental, and differential.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” transform_translate_linked__hover=”off” custom_padding=”15px|15px|15px|15px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#363636” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” box_shadow_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” box_shadow_color__hover=”#363636” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-10px” border_width_top__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_width_top__hover=”5px” border_color_top__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_top__hover=”#229DD1”][et_pb_blurb title=”FULL CLOUD BACKUP South India” alt=”ip-camera” image_icon_width=”75%” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#363636” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

It gets you back the exact and entire copy of your data which can further accesses anytime

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”15px|15px|15px|15px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#363636” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” box_shadow_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” box_shadow_color__hover=”#363636” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_width_top__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_width_top__hover=”5px” border_color_top__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_top__hover=”#229DD1” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-10px” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][et_pb_blurb title=”DIFFERENTIAL DATA STORAGE SOLUTIONS” alt=”settings” image_icon_width=”75%” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#363636” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

More applicable to backup files from the office computers for work from home. It backups the changed files after last full backup and hence takes longer time and more storage space.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”15px|15px|15px|15px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#363636” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” box_shadow_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” box_shadow_color__hover=”#363636” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_width_top__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_width_top__hover=”5px” border_color_top__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_top__hover=”#229DD1” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-10px” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][et_pb_blurb title=”INCREMENTAL BACKUP OR DATA STORGAE SOLUTIONS ” alt=”ip-camera” image_icon_width=”75%” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#363636” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

This is also applicable for people who work from home and have to backup the files from office computers. It backups the changed data after last full backup or differential backup. Thus is takes less time and storage

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”http://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/small-inner.png” background_size=”contain” custom_padding=”1px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”12px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Affordable Data Storage Solutions And Backup Services In South India,INDIA

We provide cheap backup services with our data storage solutions. The most common reasons for cloud backup are mandatory requirements of governmental organizations, archiving data for legal and future references, call for more storage capacities, and upgrade of updating software. Common causes of data loss are power failures, system crashes, and virus attacks. Our Data storage solutions optimize data storage, data access, and data security combining with the best hardware, software, and accessories to provide the right solutions.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”12px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

What is the best solution for data storage in South India?

The ideal backup solution for an organization’s data in South India depends on several key factors, such as the size of the business, the type of data being stored, security requirements, and budget. Moreover, organizations should consider additional aspects like scalability, compliance with local regulations, and the level of IT resources available. Ultimately, choosing the right solution requires evaluating both short-term needs and long-term growth potential to ensure the backup strategy aligns with the organization’s overall goals and priorities.

The most common storage solutions are On-premises storage, Network-Attached Storage(NAS), Storage Area Network (SAN), and Cloud Storage. These storage solutions each have unique features and use cases.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” transform_translate_linked__hover=”off” custom_padding=”15px|15px|15px|15px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#363636” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” box_shadow_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” box_shadow_color__hover=”#363636” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-10px” border_width_top__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_width_top__hover=”5px” border_color_top__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_top__hover=”#229DD1”][et_pb_blurb title=”On-Premises Data Storage Solutions” alt=”ip-camera” image_icon_width=”75%” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#363636” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

This refers to storing data within physical hardware that is located within the premises of an organization. It could include servers, hard drives, and other storage devices that are owned and managed directly by the organization.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”15px|15px|15px|15px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#363636” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” box_shadow_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” box_shadow_color__hover=”#363636” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_width_top__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_width_top__hover=”5px” border_color_top__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_top__hover=”#229DD1” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-10px” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][et_pb_blurb title=”SAN Data Storage Solution” alt=”settings” image_icon_width=”75%” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#363636” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

A SAN(Storage Area Network) is a high-speed network that connects multiple storage devices to servers. It provides block-level access to data, making it ideal for applications needing fast and reliable access to large volumes of data, such as databases and virtualized environments.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”15px|15px|15px|15px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#363636” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” box_shadow_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” box_shadow_color__hover=”#363636” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_width_top__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_width_top__hover=”5px” border_color_top__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_top__hover=”#229DD1” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-10px” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][et_pb_blurb title=”NAS Data Storage Solution” alt=”ip-camera” image_icon_width=”75%” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#363636” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

NAS (Network-attached storage)storage is a dedicated file storage device that operates over a network, enabling multiple users and devices to access data simultaneously. NAS devices are typically easy to set up and manage, making them ideal for small to medium-sized businesses or home networks.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”15px|15px|15px|15px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#363636” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” box_shadow_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” box_shadow_color__hover=”#363636” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_width_top__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_width_top__hover=”5px” border_color_top__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_top__hover=”#229DD1” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-10px” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][et_pb_blurb title=”Cloud Data Storage Solution” alt=”ip-camera” image_icon_width=”75%” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#363636” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Cloud storage stores data on remote servers accessible over the internet. It offers scalability, flexibility, and cost-effectiveness, as organizations only pay for the storage they use on a subscription basis. It’s suitable for businesses of all sizes.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIzMDEyMSJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Contact Now” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” custom_padding=”10px|35px|10px|35px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Data storage is crucial for any business sector. Losing a single e-mail may disrupt the whole work of your office. So to be prepared with the […]
